New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored his 3rd T20I century, the second-fastest by an Indian in 45 balls against Sri Lanka
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's masterful innings turned the game around after India lost early wickets, forming a 113-run partnership with Shubman Gill
Post-Match Reflections: Cricket fraternity praised Suryakumar Yadav's performance, with many calling him the best in the world
Others: The match was held at the Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot
